name: Cataclysm (Spacespy)
description:
In CATACLYSM You play as a cube in a conundrum, trying to dodge all incoming meteors flying down to earth. The game has a flashy geometric feel and uses only 3 colours. I could see it being on a mobile store at some point, will update if I decide to do that! I hope you enjoy this little game I made, thank you for playing! :D

MADE IN 4 DAYS FOR THE HYPER CASUAL JAM

If you would like you can put your best score in the comments down below! That would be rad!

Youtube: (1) Spacespy - YouTub (Devlog soon!)
